name: iit-ism-clubs
description: This is the website for IIT (ISM) Gymkhana

scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/* -o dist/img && imagemin clubslink/images/* -o dist/clubslink/images && imagemin clubslink/images1/* -o dist/clubslink/images1/
scripts.usemin: usemin k.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/k.html && usemin clubslink/LITERARY.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/LITERARY.html && usemin clubslink/CULTURAL.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/CULTURAL.html && usemin clubslink/PHOTO.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/PHOTO.html && usemin clubslink/technical.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/clubslink/technical.html
scripts.build: npm run usemin && npm run imagemin

author: cjchirag7
